00045 #include "board.h"
00046 #include "dip204.h"
00047 #include "gpio.h"
00048 #include "compiler.h"
00049 #include "spi.h"
00050 #include "pwm.h"
00051 
00053 #define DIP204_WRITE_COMMAND             0xF8
00054 
00056 #define DIP204_WRITE_DATA                0xFA
00057 
00059 #define DIP204_READ_COMMAND              0xFC
00060 
00062 #define DIP204_READ_DATA                 0xFE
00063 
00064 #define DIP204_PERIOD_MAX          50
00065 
00066 
00067 static void dip204_write_byte(unsigned short byte);
00068 static void dip204_read_byte(unsigned short * byte);
00069 static void dip204_select(void);
00070 static void dip204_unselect(void);
00071 static void dip204_wait_busy(void);
00072 extern void delay_ms(unsigned short time_ms);
00073 
00075 unsigned short pwm_duty;
00076 
00078 avr32_pwm_channel_t pwm_channel;
00079 
00081 int channel_id = -1;
00082 
00083 /****************************** global functions *****************************/
00084 
00085 void dip204_init(backlight_options option)
00086 {
00087   pwm_opt_t pwm_opt;  // pwm option config
00088 
00089   if (option == backlight_PWM)
00090   {
00091     channel_id = DIP204_PWM_CHANNEL;
00092     gpio_enable_module_pin(AVR32_PWM_PWM_6_PIN, AVR32_PWM_PWM_6_FUNCTION);
00093 
00094     // PWM controller configuration
00095     pwm_opt.diva=1;
00096     pwm_opt.divb=0;
00097     pwm_opt.prea=0;
00098     pwm_opt.preb=0;
00099 
00100     pwm_init(&pwm_opt);
00101     pwm_duty = DIP204_PERIOD_MAX - 1;
00102     pwm_channel.CMR.calg = PWM_MODE_LEFT_ALIGNED;   // channel mode
00103     pwm_channel.CMR.cpol = PWM_POLARITY_LOW;   // channel polarity
00104     pwm_channel.CMR.cpd = PWM_UPDATE_PERIOD;   // not used the first time
00105     pwm_channel.CMR.cpre = 8;   // channel prescaler
00106     pwm_channel.cdty = pwm_duty;  // channel duty cycle, should be < CPRD
00107     pwm_channel.cprd = DIP204_PERIOD_MAX;  // channel period
00108     pwm_channel.cupd = 0;  // channel update is not used here.
00109 
00110     pwm_channel_init(channel_id, &pwm_channel);
00111     // start PWM
00112     pwm_start_channels(1 << channel_id);
00113   }
00114   else
00115   {
00116     gpio_clr_gpio_pin(DIP204_BACKLIGHT_PIN);
00117   }
00118   // delay for power on
00119   delay_ms(20);
00120   // select the LCD chip
00121   dip204_select();
00122   // Send Command Start Byte
00123   dip204_write_byte(DIP204_WRITE_COMMAND);
00124   // Send "extended Function Set" Command  (RE=1)
00125   dip204_write_byte(0x34);
00126   // Wait for command execution
00127   delay_ms(1);
00128   // Send "Enter 4-Line Mode" Command
00129   dip204_write_byte(0x09);
00130   // Wait for command execution
00131   delay_ms(1);
00132   // Send "Function Set" Command (RE=0)
00133   dip204_write_byte(0x30);
00134   // Wait for command execution
00135   delay_ms(1);
00136   // Send "Display On Command: Display On, Cursor On, Blink On"
00137   dip204_write_byte(0x0F);
00138   // Wait for command execution
00139   delay_ms(1);
00140   // Send "Display Clear" Command
00141   dip204_write_byte(0x01);
00142   // Wait for command execution
00143   delay_ms(5);
00144   // Send "Entry Mode Set Command: Increment Mode, Entire Shift off"
00145   dip204_write_byte(0x06);
00146   // Wait for command execution
00147   delay_ms(1);
00148   dip204_wait_busy();
00149   // unselect chip
00150   dip204_unselect();
00151 }
00152 
00153 void dip204_set_backlight(backlight_power power)
00154 {
00155   if ((power == backlight_power_decrease) && (channel_id != -1))
00156   {
00157     // update channel duty cycle using double buffering to prevent unexpected waveform.
00158     pwm_duty = Max((pwm_duty - (DIP204_PERIOD_MAX / 10)) , 1);
00159     pwm_channel.CMR.cpd = PWM_UPDATE_DUTY;
00160     // new duty cycle
00161     pwm_channel.cupd = pwm_duty;
00162     // set channel configuration.
00163     pwm_update_channel (channel_id, &pwm_channel);
00164   }
00165   else if ((power == backlight_power_increase) && (channel_id != -1))
00166   {
00167     // update channel duty cycle using double buffering to prevent unexpected waveform.
00168     pwm_duty = Min((pwm_duty + (DIP204_PERIOD_MAX / 10)) , (DIP204_PERIOD_MAX-1));
00169     pwm_channel.CMR.cpd = PWM_UPDATE_DUTY;
00170     // new duty cycle
00171     pwm_channel.cupd = pwm_duty;
00172     // set channel configuration.
00173     pwm_update_channel (channel_id, &pwm_channel);
00174   }
00175 }

00177 
00178 void dip204_show_cursor(void)
00179 {
00180   /* select the LCD chip */
00181   dip204_select();
00182   /* Send Command Start Byte */
00183   dip204_write_byte(DIP204_WRITE_COMMAND);
00184   /* Send "Display On Command: Display On, Cursor On, Blink On" */
00185   dip204_write_byte(0x0F);
00186   dip204_wait_busy();
00187   /* unselect chip */
00188   dip204_unselect();
00189 }
00190 
00191 
00192 void dip204_hide_cursor(void)
00193 {
00194   /* select the LCD chip */
00195   dip204_select();
00196   /* Send Command Start Byte */
00197   dip204_write_byte(DIP204_WRITE_COMMAND);
00198   /* Send "Display On Command: Display On, Cursor On, Blink On" */
00199   dip204_write_byte(0x0C);
00200   dip204_wait_busy();
00201   /* unselect chip */
00202   dip204_unselect();
00203 }

00205 
00206 void dip204_write_data(unsigned char data)
00207 {
00208   dip204_select();
00209   /* Send Write Data Start-Byte */
00210   dip204_write_byte(DIP204_WRITE_DATA);
00211   /* send data */
00212   dip204_write_byte(data);
00213   dip204_wait_busy();
00214   dip204_unselect();
00215 }
00216 
00217 
00218 void dip204_read_data(unsigned short *data)
00219 {
00220   dip204_select();
00221   /* Send Read Data Start-Byte */
00222   dip204_write_byte(DIP204_READ_DATA);
00223   /* read SPI data */
00224   *data = 0;
00225   dip204_read_byte(data);
00226   /* wait for LCD */
00227   dip204_wait_busy();
00228   dip204_unselect();
00229 }
00230 
00231 
00232 void dip204_set_cursor_position(unsigned char row, unsigned char line)
00233 {
00234 unsigned char address = 0;
00235 
00236   dip204_select();
00237   if ((row <= 20) && (line <= 4))
00238   {
00239     /* Calculate DDRAM address from line and row values */
00240     address = ( (line-1) * 32 ) + ( row-1 ) + 128;
00241   }
00242   /* Send Command Start Byte */
00243   dip204_write_byte(DIP204_WRITE_COMMAND);
00244   /* Send Adress lower Nibble */
00245   dip204_write_byte(address);
00246   dip204_wait_busy();
00247   dip204_unselect();
00248 }
00249 
00250 
00251 void dip204_clear_display(void)
00252 {
00253   dip204_select();
00254   /* Send Command Start Byte */
00255   dip204_write_byte(DIP204_WRITE_COMMAND);
00256   /* Send Display Clear Command */
00257   dip204_write_byte(0x01);
00258   /* Wait for command execution */
00259   delay_ms(4);
00260   dip204_wait_busy();
00261   dip204_unselect();
00262 }
00263 
00264 void dip204_write_string(const char *string)
00265 {
00266 unsigned char i=0;
00267 
00268   dip204_select();
00269   /* for all chars in string */
00270   while(string[i]!=0)
00271   {
00272     /* Send Write Data Start Byte */
00273     dip204_write_byte(DIP204_WRITE_DATA);
00274     /* Send byte */
00275     dip204_write_byte(string[i]);
00276     /* go to next char */
00277     i++;
00278     dip204_wait_busy();
00279   }
00280   dip204_unselect();
00281 }

00288 static void dip204_select(void)
00289 {
00290   spi_selectChip(DIP204_SPI, DIP204_SPI_CS);
00291 }
00292 
00296 static void dip204_unselect(void)
00297 {
00298   spi_unselectChip(DIP204_SPI, DIP204_SPI_CS);
00299 }
00300 
00307 static void dip204_write_byte(unsigned short byte)
00308 {
00309 unsigned short i;
00310 unsigned short reverse = 0x00;
00311   switch (byte)
00312   {
00313     /* MSB first for command */
00314     case DIP204_READ_COMMAND:
00315     case DIP204_WRITE_COMMAND:
00316     case DIP204_READ_DATA:
00317     case DIP204_WRITE_DATA:
00318     {
00319       /* send D7 to D0 */
00320       spi_write(DIP204_SPI, byte);
00321       break;
00322     }
00323     /* LSB first for all other data */
00324     default :
00325     {
00326       /* reverse byte */
00327       for (i = 0 ; i < 8 ; i++)
00328       {
00329         if (Tst_bits(byte, (1 << i)))
00330         {
00331           Set_bits(reverse, (1 << (7-i)));
00332         }
00333       }
00334       /* send D0 to D3 */
00335       spi_write(DIP204_SPI, (reverse & 0xF0));
00336       /* send D4 to D7 */
00337       spi_write(DIP204_SPI, ((reverse << 4) & 0xF0));
00338       break;
00339     }
00340   }
00341 }
00342 
00349 static void dip204_read_byte(unsigned short * byte)
00350 {
00351 unsigned short reverse = 0x00;
00352 unsigned short i;
00353   /* dummy write */
00354   spi_write(DIP204_SPI, 0x00);
00355   /* read RSR register */
00356   spi_read(DIP204_SPI, &reverse);
00357   *byte = 0;
00358   /* Revert received byte (issued LSB first by the LCD) */
00359   for (i = 0 ; i < 8 ; i++)
00360   {
00361     if (Tst_bits(reverse, (1 << i)))
00362     {
00363       Set_bits(*byte, (1 << (7-i)));
00364     }
00365   }
00366 }
00367 
00371 static void dip204_wait_busy(void)
00372 {
00373 unsigned short status = 0x00;
00374   /* send read commd to LCD */
00375   dip204_write_byte(DIP204_READ_COMMAND);
00376   /* read next byte */
00377   do {
00378   dip204_read_byte(&status);
00379   /* keep D7 to know status */
00380   }while (status & 0x80);
00381 }
